data.name: XIndexEntrySupplier
desc:
supplies information on index entries to generate a \"table of
alphabetical index\" for a given locale.

methods.name: getIndexCharacter
desc: returns the capital index key for sorting a table of indexes, to a given index entry, to a given com.sun.star.lang.Locale and to a given sort algorithm.
For example, in English locale it returns \"K\" for \"keyboard\"

methods.name: getIndexFollowPageWord
desc: returns the page number word of an index entry, where one page or more pages are combined to one page number entry, for a given com.sun.star.lang.Locale.

For example, in English locale it returns 
\"p.\" for bMorePages == FALSE 
\"pp.\" for bMorePages == TRUE
